high_descs: Turn right, walk to the night stand, turn left, walk to the table
Grab the disc on the table
Turn left and turn left, walk to the AC
Turn on the lamp on the table
anns.task_desc: Grab the disc on the table, turn on the lamp on the table

high_descs: Turn to the right and then the left to find the mirror on the wall.
Pick up the CD from the box on the floor.
Turn to the left and go to the desk on the other side of the room.
Turn on the lamp on the desk.
Turn right and begin walking across the room, then hang a left and walk up to the small end table below the mirror.
Pick up the disc that is laying on top of the end table to the right of the phone.
Turn left and begin walking across the room, then hang a left and walk over to the windows, once there turn right to face the small lamp on the wooden desk.
Turn on the light of the small lamp.
anns.task_desc: Examine a disk in the light of a small lamp.
